revised_title: On the Direct Application of First Principles in the Theory of Partial Differential Equations
tldr: The authors discuss the direct application of first principles in the theory of partial differential equations, focusing on the non-analytical exposition of differential criteria of algebraic functionality given by Jacobi. They also explore the application of these principles to the theory of partial differential equations of the first and second order, particularly those named after Lagrange, Monge, and Ampere.
